title: What can you as a student from PES , tell to someone from local engineering college with no tier something just like a advice???

comments.body: Bro from a no tier clg needs an advice from another no tier clg wtf
bro i just asked  an advice from someone who is a great college for a person who has ended up in a bad one

See brother there's no such thing as good or bad colleges. Comparison is the thief of joy. Every college will have some pros and cons. There's no point sitting and regretting choices. Wherever your friend is they'll do good don't worry.

Thanku so much this is the only legit helping comment thanks for being kind i know that eevry college whether its pes rv or any bad college all are same but dont you agree pes offers great packages placements so am just worried of ending up jobless because i am from worst college
The market situation is worse rn. Jobs have shrunk but not completely diminished. So can't guarantee the best placements for now. Your skill set will only guarantee you a job.
